name: Bound Soul
description:
Bound Soul is my first game. It's a 2d action platformer. You play as a skull exploring a ruined city in search of your body.  You can also explore and find optional collectables, if you want.

The game was created in Unity over the course of a few months. Since it's my first game and i wanted to finish the project relatively quickly, it's not exactly the most polished experience. Hopefully you can still enjoy it for what it is, though. I hope you have fun playing it, and stay tuned for some far more polished (and interesting) games from me in the future :)

(Also, if there's enough interest, i may make a patch tweaking and polishing the game further, adding more QoL stuff, ect.)

Everything was done by me except for some sound effects. Some were done by my friend David MM Ramos, some are from freesound.org, which i'll link here:

https://freesound.org/people/JustInvoke/sounds/446115/

https://freesound.org/people/JustInvoke/sounds/446100/

https://freesound.org/people/JustInvoke/sounds/446098/

The rest were done by me.
